doc.title: SVN

value.content: Apache Subversion (SVN) is a free source control management (SCM) system. It allows developers to keep a history of text and code modifications. Although SVN can also handle binary files, we do not recommend that you use it for such files.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Apache Subversion on Wikipedia
  • Official website
